/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a vibrant street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. A few cars and a bus can be seen on the road, indicating a busy day in the city. The image beautifully encapsulates the blend of nature and urban life in Beijing.
